snippet.title: Heartsworn Abyss Trailer (EN)
snippet.description:
A tragic NTR adventure about finding one’s place in a dystopian island nation.
Can you help Akari escape the darkness of Miyogawa and find happiness?

Heartsworn Abyss is a hand-drawn visual novel with authentic voice acting.

Please support our development here: https://www.patreon.com/skyblueaster
